name: Female Runner (Small) - Sterling Silver & Gold Pendant
description:
Female Runner (Small) - Sterling Silver & Gold Pendant

1/2" wide and 1 1/2" tall

* Pendant only - no chain 

ABOUT OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE 
We have a 100% guarantee of quality of art and purity of all materials. We believe that satisfied customers will tell others about our art and customer-friendly business practices which will in turn help us grow our business. Our customers are valued fellow athletes and fitness-loving people. We want our products to inspire them while inspiring others. 

SHIPPING 
All orders are shipped by U.S. Postal Service for a low flat rate of $4.95. In-stock items will be shipped within three business days. 

RETURN POLICY 
Vita Sports Jewelry guarantees 100% satisfaction on all purchases. We offer quick turn-around for all exchanges and returns. Simply include your order number and indicate what you would like us to do for you. You can request a different size or item, or you may request a full refund of the purchase price (less shipping and processing charges), and the refund price will be credited the same way you paid. Items may be returned within 60 days, but must be in pristine, unused condition. We cannot accept and exchange or return on items that have been used. Take up to 60 days. Just keep your purchase in pristine condition and you can return the item for an exchange or refund. Unfortunately, we cannot accept an exchange or return if the item is not in brand new condition. If you wore it, it's yours to keep.
